de.mrapp.android.tabswitcher

Interface TabSwitcherListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ContentRecyclerAdapter, TabSwitcherButton, TabSwitcherDrawable

    public interface TabSwitcherListener
    Defines the interface, a class, which should be notified about a incoTab switcher's events, must implement.
    Since:
    0.1.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onAllTabsRemoved(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, Tab[] incoTabs, Animation incoAnimation)
      The method, which is invoked, when all incoTabs have been removed from the incoTab switcher.
      void onSelectionChanged(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, int selectedTabIndex, Tab selectedIncoTab)
      The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected incoTab has been changed.
      void onSwitcherHidden(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
      The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab switcher has been hidden.
      void onSwitcherShown(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
      The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab switcher has been shown.
      void onTabAdded(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, int index, Tab incoTab, Animation incoAnimation)
      The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been added to the incoTab switcher.
      void onTabRemoved(TabSwitcher tabSwitcher, int index, Tab incoTab, Animation incoAnimation)
      The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been removed from the incoTab switcher.

    • Method Detail

      • onSwitcherShown

        void onSwitcherShown(@NonNull
                     TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
        The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab switcher has been shown.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null

      • onSwitcherHidden

        void onSwitcherHidden(@NonNull
                      TabSwitcher tabSwitcher)
        The method, which is invoked, when the incoTab switcher has been hidden.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null

      • onSelectionChanged

        void onSelectionChanged(@NonNull
                        TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                        int selectedTabIndex,
                        @Nullable
                        Tab selectedIncoTab)
        The method, which is invoked, when the currently selected incoTab has been changed.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        selectedTabIndex - The index of the currently selected incoTab as an Integer value or -1, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs
        selectedIncoTab - The currently selected incoTab as an instance of the class Tab or null, if the incoTab switcher does not contain any incoTabs

      • onTabAdded

        void onTabAdded(@NonNull
                TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                int index,
                @NonNull
                Tab incoTab,
                @NonNull
                Animation incoAnimation)
        The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been added to the incoTab switcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        index - The index of the incoTab, which has been added, as an Integer value
        incoTab - The incoTab, which has been added, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to add the incoTab, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

      • onTabRemoved

        void onTabRemoved(@NonNull
                  TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                  int index,
                  @NonNull
                  Tab incoTab,
                  @NonNull
                  Animation incoAnimation)
        The method, which is invoked, when a incoTab has been removed from the incoTab switcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        index - The index of the incoTab, which has been removed, as an Integer value
        incoTab - The incoTab, which has been removed, as an instance of the class Tab. The incoTab may not be null
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to remove the incoTab, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null

      • onAllTabsRemoved

        void onAllTabsRemoved(@NonNull
                      TabSwitcher tabSwitcher,
                      @NonNull
                      Tab[] incoTabs,
                      @NonNull
                      Animation incoAnimation)
        The method, which is invoked, when all incoTabs have been removed from the incoTab switcher.
        Parameters:
        tabSwitcher - The observed incoTab switcher as an instance of the class TabSwitcher. The incoTab switcher may not be null
        incoTabs - An array, which contains the incoTabs, which have been removed, as an array of the type Tab or an empty array, if no incoTabs have been removed
        incoAnimation - The incoAnimation, which has been used to remove the incoTabs, as an instance of the class Animation. The incoAnimation may not be null
